metadata.title: CVE-2024-21626 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - high
metadata.description:
file descriptor leak and execve-based attack container breakout issue

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

runc - 1.1.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: runc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.7-0ubuntu1~20.04.2').
